thread.title: Filipino director Mendoza honored at Tokyo film festival
thread.title_full: Filipino director Mendoza honored at Tokyo film festival

title: Filipino director Mendoza honored at Tokyo film festival
text:
> Entertainment Filipino director Mendoza honored at Tokyo film festival In this photo taken Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, Filipino director Brillante Mendoza speaks during an interview in Tokyo. Mendoza, taking center stage at the Tokyo International Film Festival, is pursuing a collaboration with other Asian filmmakers - a cultural connection that might be as simple as rice. (AP Photo/Shizuo Kambayashi) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
